summary: Single-page responsive landing website for a digital astrology remedy guide targeting Indian users aged 22-50 facing financial stress, health worries, career delays, or business instability. Emotionally engaging tone focused on real-life pain points. Mobile-first design optimized for paid ads traffic with conversion-focused structure.
architectural_notes: Mobile-first design optimized for paid ads traffic
Color scheme: white, gold accents, black background
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero section background image showing warm, aspirational scene suggesting financial peace and life stability with Indian cultural context (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Trust badge icon for instant download symbol in gold and white (badge-instant.dim_120x120.png)
- Trust badge icon for one-time payment symbol in gold and white (badge-payment.dim_120x120.png)
- Trust badge icon for digital access symbol in gold and white (badge-digital.dim_120x120.png)
- Product mockup showing the astrology remedy guide as a professional digital document with gold accents (product-mockup.dim_800x1000.png)

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-first, responsive single-page landing website using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS with a warm, trustworthy color scheme (white background, gold accents, black text) and large readable fonts
Implement a hero section with an emotional headline addressing feelings of being stuck in money, health, and life progress, plus a prominent CTA button for instant download
Create a problem section that describes common struggles: income instability, health fatigue, mental stress, promotion delays, and slow business growth using relatable, human language
Implement a fear/FOMO bridge section explaining that effort alone isn't enough and that unseen energetic or planetary imbalance may affect outcomes
Create a solution section introducing the product as a simple, practical astrology remedy guide covering money, health, peace, career growth, and business stability
Implement a benefits section listing outcomes: improved financial discipline, emotional calm, clearer decisions, and better opportunity flow
Create a 'What's included' section listing: planet-based remedies, weekly planner, daily checklist, and ritual calendar
Implement a price section with anchor pricing showing a higher crossed-out price and a discounted offer of ₹299, plus instant download reassurance
Create an FAQ section answering three questions: 'Do I need a horoscope?', 'Are remedies complicated?', and 'How soon can I expect results?'
Implement a final CTA section with urgency messaging encouraging immediate purchase action
Add a sticky CTA button that remains visible on mobile as users scroll through the page
Include trust badges displaying 'Instant Download', 'One-time Payment', and 'Digital Access' throughout the page to build credibility
Optimize page layout and content flow for paid ads traffic conversion with clear visual hierarchy and minimal friction to purchase

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section with emotional headline and CTA button
Problem section describing common user struggles
Fear/FOMO bridge section about planetary imbalance
Solution section introducing the astrology remedy guide
What's included section with guide contents
Price section with anchor pricing and ₹299 offer
Final CTA section with urgency messaging
Trust badges (instant download, one-time payment, digital access)

projectName: Digital Astrology Remedy Guide Landing Page
